title: Does Anyone have any ideas on how to fix a black screen after champ select i have tried everything
body: I have been playing league now for  a while and I'm staring to actually like it and all of sudden one day I'm about to play a game and i get into champ select and everything but when the game starts to load all I see is a black screen and my cursor loading and than the game crashes and give me the "Failed to Connect" error and it says Unable to connect to the server. Please check your Network connection and attempt to reconnect to your game. and than it give me two options to either retry or cancel and retry just does the black screen thing again and cancel just crashes the game and that's it and i really need help because i want to play league

replies.body: I'm having the exact same issue. I reinstalled League, Patched it and reinstalled again and again. Every time the game loads, it crashes me out. I'm fine in champion select. It's just loading the game that's the issue. This is getting rather tiring too since my husband has no issues on his end playing League....

Black screens are usually due to a network issue that's failing to establish a connection to the server and download assets.  Your best bet would be to go through each step in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
